new_items.example_en: He remained obdurate despite strong evidence.
new_items.example_zh: 即便證據明確，他依舊頑固不改。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: An obstreperous crowd ignored the barriers.
new_items.label: new

new_items.en_definition: to deliberately avoid or abstain from
new_items.example_en: They eschew sugar during training season.
new_items.example_zh: 訓練季他們會刻意避開糖分。
new_items.label: new

new_items.zh_explanation: 不致冒犯；撫慰的／無害的
new_items.example_en: The speech was anodyne and offended no one.
new_items.example_zh: 那場演說中庸無害，沒有冒犯任何人。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: He was complaisant toward his influential client.
new_items.example_zh: 他對那位有影響力的客戶十分順從。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: His fatuous remark derailed the discussion.
new_items.example_zh: 他愚蠢的一句話讓討論走偏。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: A lachrymose ballad played on repeat.
new_items.example_zh: 一首催淚的抒情歌反覆播放。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: No one could gainsay the clear evidence.
new_items.example_zh: 沒人能反駁那份明確的證據。
new_items.label: new

review_items.example_en: His ebullient energy lifted the whole team.
review_items.example_zh: 他滿溢的熱情帶動了整個團隊。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: He grew up in an impecunious household.
review_items.example_zh: 他在清貧的家庭長大。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: to speak or act in an evasive way
review_items.example_en: Stop prevaricating and answer directly.
review_items.example_zh: 別再支吾其詞，直接回答。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: to root out and destroy completely
review_items.example_en: The project aims to extirpate invasive weeds.
review_items.example_zh: 這項計畫旨在根除外來雜草。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: Recalcitrant members blocked the vote.
review_items.example_zh: 幾位不服從的成員擋下表決。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: Both sides stayed intransigent despite talks.
review_items.example_zh: 儘管協商，雙方仍然強硬不讓步。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: Investors are chary of such speculative ventures.
review_items.example_zh: 投資人對這種投機計畫相當謹慎。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: The story about the founder is likely apocryphal.
review_items.example_zh: 關於創辦人的那段故事多半是傳聞。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: calm, unemotional, and hard to rouse
review_items.example_en: He stayed phlegmatic during the outage.
review_items.example_zh: 停電期間他仍保持冷靜。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: to direct or prohibit by authoritative order
review_items.example_en: The court enjoined the firm from using the trademark.
review_items.example_zh: 法院禁制該公司使用該商標。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: Profligate spending sank the organization.
review_items.example_zh: 揮霍無度讓組織走向沉淪。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: His peripatetic career spanned three cities.
review_items.example_zh: 他巡迴式的職涯橫跨三座城市。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: The professor's abstruse proof confused the class.
review_items.example_zh: 教授晦澀的證明讓全班困惑。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: just begun and not fully formed
review_items.example_en: An inchoate plan began to take shape.
review_items.example_zh: 雛形計畫逐漸成形。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: lacking a plan, purpose, or enthusiasm
review_items.example_en: Our desultory meeting produced few concrete plans.
review_items.example_zh: 我們散漫的會議幾乎沒有產出。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: referring to sexual matters in a coarse way
review_items.example_en: A ribald joke broke the tense mood.
review_items.example_zh: 一個粗俗笑話打破了緊張氣氛。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: Her ingenuous smile quickly won trust.
review_items.example_zh: 她天真的笑容很快贏得信任。
review_items.label: review

review_items.en_definition: a feeling of listlessness and boredom
review_items.example_en: By noon a wave of ennui settled over the office.
review_items.example_zh: 到中午時，整個辦公室瀰漫著倦怠。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: The contumacious protesters defied the new order.
review_items.example_zh: 那些桀驁的抗議者無視新命令。
review_items.label: review

review_items.example_en: He is an inveterate night owl and coder.
review_items.example_zh: 他根深蒂固地是個夜貓子工程師。
review_items.label: review
